p: California and Colorado birds were collected, housed, transported and inoculated under the following approved permits and protocols: i) University of California, Davis, Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) protocols 12876 and 12880 ii) Colorado State University, Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee protocol 10-2078A iii) USGS Master Station Banding Permit 22763 iv) State of California Scientific Collecting Permits v) Federal Permit MB082812 vi) BUA 0554 by the University of California, Davis, Environmental Health and Safety Committee, and USDA Permit 47901 vii) IACUC 10-2078A in the Animal Disease Lab at Colorado State University.
